EmailTemplate.subject: Thought Leadership from Castlight and Livongo
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
I wanted to share a blog post from our partners at Castlight health. The blog does a great job explaining the financial and clinical importance of managing hypertension, diabetes, and other chronic conditions. Castlight formed a strategic partnership with Livongo to address these concerns and because of their belief in our proven approach to managing chronic conditions.
The Livongo and Castlight partnership provides two key benefits:
An easy implementation process: Castlight clients can easily add Livongo into the existing Castlight ecosystem, saving time and hassles. Improved enrollment and utilization: Castlight’s engagement and incentives programs naturally drive Livongo users to enroll in the program and utilize all of the added benefits.
I would love to schedule some time to discuss more about Livongo’s partnership with Castlight and how we are revolutionizing chronic conditions management.
Best regards,
Jim Hartman Vice President of Sales, Health Systems Livongo m: 813-476-4188 e: jhartman@livongo.com a: 444 N. Michigan Ave. Ste 3400, Chicago, IL 60611 www.livongo.com
